mapper.select: SELECT u.username, cl.id, cl.dispatch_order_number AS dispatchOrderNumber, cl.fault_dispatch_request_id AS faultDispatchRequestId, cl.content , cl.process_person_id as processPersonId, cl.process_time AS processTime, cl.user_type AS userType, cl.flag_read AS flagRead, cl.read_time AS readTime, cl.upload_file_name AS uploadFileName, cl.upload_file_url AS uploadFileUrl, cl.image_file_name AS imageFileName, cl.image_file_url AS imageFileUrl FROM fdp_dispatch_request_chat_log cl INNER JOIN ( SELECT fault_dispatch_request_id, max( id ) maxid FROM fdp_dispatch_request_chat_log WHERE flag_read = 0 AND user_type = "DISPATCHREQ" AND fault_dispatch_request_id in ( SELECT fault_dispatch_request_id from fdp_fault_dispatch_order where last_deal_person_id=#{userId,jdbcType=INTEGER} ) GROUP BY fault_dispatch_request_id ) t1 ON cl.id = t1.maxid LEFT JOIN sys_console_users u on u.id = cl.process_person_id ORDER BY cl.id DESC
